# llms.txt
> PS-CONSULT provides strategic regulatory consulting services, showcasing expertise through service offerings, project examples, and direct contact options.

## Overview
- / — Homepage introducing PS Consulting and its value proposition.

## Company Info
- /about — Background on the company, its mission, and leadership.

## Services
- /services — Detailed descriptions of consulting services offered.

## Portfolio
- /example-projects — Case studies and examples of past consulting projects.

## Contact
- /contact — Contact form and communication details for inquiries.
